song.englishname: Nobody Can Take My Life Away

english.segment1: Nobody can take my life away from me. Because I gave my life to you. No one can take my heart away. Because I gave my heart over to you. On the day that I found you. Nobody Can take my light away from me. Because my light shines just from you. No one can take my song away. Because i'm singin' a song that's new. Every day since I found you
english.segment2: What can I do now they cry. Don't give your life away. Don't give your life away. One thing that I know. If I don't I will surely die
english.segment3: Nobody, Nobody, nobody no one. can take my life away, my life away. Nobody, nobody, nobody no one. can take my life away, my life away
english.segment4: I am built upon the Rock. That never changes. Never changes, never changes
english.segment5: Nobody, nobody, nobody can ever take. my life no way. Nobody, nobody can ever take my. life away, my life away
